item.title: simulating meta-analysis data
item.description: # packages library(tidyverse) meta-parameters I want to (re)run trials of simulations for: different sample sizes different distributions (also different arm adjustment in the meta-analysis simulation) meta_parameters <- list( sample_size = c(15, 30), distribution = list( list( dist = "exp", pars = list(rate = 2) ), list( dist = "lnorm", pars = list(meanlog = 2, sdlog = 1) ) ) ) %>% purrr::cross() # take a look meta_parameters %>% str(2) ## List of 4 ## $ :List of 2 ## .
